extendedInfo.description: Better designed book reader with powerful controls & full functions, supports epub, pdf, mobi, chm, cbr, cbz, umd, fb2, txt, html, rar, zip or OPDS formats.âAdditional benefits in pro version:â Ad-free, faster & smootherâ Shake the phone to speak (Text-to-speech, TTS engine support)â PDF support, fast & speech compatibleâ Reading statistics functionâ More beautiful themes, background images and fontsâ Customize reader bar functionâ Headset & Bluetooth keys controlâ Multi-point touch supportâ Option for password protection at startupâ Book to home screen shortcutâ Annotations, highlights & bookmarks share supportâ Open/Backup/Sync/Download/Upload book files via Dropboxâ Customer email supportâPDF features in Pro version:â Fill out PDF Formâ Highlight, annotation, handwritingâ Smart scroll lock, smooth reading experienceâ Night mode support, 6 additional pdf themes availableâ Dual-page mode for landscape screenâ Speech, auto-scroll compatible â Read statistics, sync, flip animation availableâThe key features:â¢ Support online ebook libraries and personal calibre ebook server.â¢ Read local books with smooth scroll and tons of innovation.âStandard functions:â¢ Full visual options: line space, font scale, bold, italic, shadow, alpha colors, fading edge etc.â¢ 10+ themes embedded, includes Day & Night mode switcher.â¢ Various types of paging: touch screen, volume keys or even camera, search or back keys.â¢ 24 customized operations (screen click, swipe gesture, hardware keys), apply to 15 customized events: search, bookmark, themes, navigation, font size and more.â¢ 5 auto-scroll modes: rolling blind mode; by pixel, by line or by page. Real-time speed control.â¢ Adjust the brightness by sliding your finger along the left edge of the screen, gesture commands supported.â¢ Intelligent paragraph; indent paragraph; trim unwanted blank spaces and lines options.â¢ Keep your eyes health options for long-time reading.â¢ Real page turning effect with customized speed/color/transparent; 5 page flip animations.â¢ My Bookshelf design: Favorites, Downloads, Authors, Tags; self bookcover, search, import supported.â¢ Justified text alignment, hyphenation mode supported.â¢ Dual page mode for landscape screen.â¢ Support all four screen orientations.â¢ EPUB3 multimedia content support (video and audio)â¢ Backup/Restore options to cloud via DropBox, sync reading positions between phones and tablets.â¢ Highlight, Annotation, Dictionary (Offline or Online, support ColorDict, GoldenDict, Fora, ABBYY Lingvo, etc.), Translation, Share functions all in moon+ ebook reader.â¢ Localized in 40 languages: English, á áá­á, Ø§ÙØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙØ©, Õ°Õ¡ÕµÕ¥ÖÕ¥Õ¶, ÐÑÐ»Ð³Ð°ÑÑÐºÐ¸, catalÃ , ÄeskÃ½, dansk, Nederlands, eesti, suomi, franÃ§ais, galego, á¡áá¥áá áááááá¡, Deutsch, ÎµÎ»Î»Î·Î½Î¹ÎºÎ¬, ×¢××¨××ª, magyar, Indonesia, italiano, æ¥æ¬èª, íêµ­ì´, Ð¼Ð°ÐºÐµÐ´Ð¾Ð½ÑÐºÐ¸, persan, polski, portuguÃªs, portuguÃªs brasil, romÃ¢n, ÑÑÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, ÑÑÐ¿ÑÐºÐ¸, ç®ä½ä¸­æ, slovenskÃ½ch, slovenskega, espaÃ±ol, Svenskt, ç¹é«ä¸­æ, à¸ à¸²à¸©à¸²à¹à¸à¸¢, TÃ¼rk, Ð£ÐºÑÐ°ÑÐ½ÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, Viá»t-Tags: book reader, ebook reader, pdf reader, ebook speech, pdf annotate form, epub, mobi, pdf, rar, moon reader pro, ibook, stanza, kindle, nook color, aldiko HD, kobo, comics, comic reader, cbz reader-About GET_ACCOUNTS permission: used for Google Drive function only-About READ_PHONE_STATE permission: used to stop TTS when there is a call coming

reviews.title: The best all-round ereader
reviews.comment: The best ereader I\'ve found, highly customisable, and nicely arranges your books. Also links to various sites offering free ebooks. Definitely worth the cost of the Pro version in my opinion.
reviews.author: David Rodwell

reviews.title: Awesome reader
reviews.comment: Smooth, fast, intuitive. Super satisfied with it.
reviews.author: Panos Papadopoulos

reviews.title: Best ereader out there
reviews.comment: I have the pro version running on 3 tablets and 2 phones. Does everything and more. Keeps everything synced nicely. Have had no problems at all.
reviews.author: Kevin de Kock

reviews.title: Great reader
reviews.comment: Highly recommend the full version of this reader. One of the best available and regularly updated. Price is great as well
reviews.author: Martin Reaney

reviews.title: Glad I bought it..
reviews.comment: As far as readers go, this is about as good as it gets. It has support for pretty much any format, it\'s fast, and it has plenty of options, if you choose to use them (although the defaults are perfectly fine). If you\'re looking for a paid reader, this is the one I recommend.
reviews.author: Nicholas M

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Awesome app bugs are fixed timely when they occur. Tts works great fast clean what could possibly be better about it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PERFECT!
reviews.comment: This app has been my best friend for school. It does everything. Devs have done great at designing a great app. Well worth the price.
reviews.author: Brian Stone

reviews.title: The one I recommend!
reviews.comment: Having tried numerous othet E-reader Apps available on the Play store, both before and aftrt originally downloading Moon+; I always find myself returning to Moon+ very quickly. It is the most stable and easily customised of the lot I have tried and it is still regularly updated by the creators.  This always the one App I recommend when discussing E-reader.
reviews.author: Susan Dunnicliff

reviews.title: Simply the best.
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried them all. No, really all of them. I\'ve tried every reader out there and this one is simply the best.
reviews.author: Mikal Donovan

reviews.title: Unsurpassed
reviews.comment: I searched a lot to find an app that can manage my ebooks as well as pdf. This app is head and shoulder above a any other option.  Better integration with the dictionary would be nice to be implemented.
reviews.author: Hamzeh Zarei

reviews.comment: Fantastic reader ,I had the free version for about how3 days and it is that good that i wanted the pro version . I love the book shelf,having all my material .pdf,e books all on display  makes it so easy to find what i am looking for .best reader app by far .
reviews.author: Philip Richardson

reviews.title: Great reader a must have
reviews.comment: Wonderful app. The PDF features are on par with ez PDF reader. Sometimes I feel it opens PDF faster than ez reader and only needs \'fit to column\' option.Opens even 140 mb files in seconds. but please add djVu support and this app will truly be God like cause I need djvu reader for few books.Keep updating the PDF utility and add djvu support. But 5 stars nonetheless.
reviews.author: Anurag Gunderia

reviews.comment: This is a really good app I use it with Dropbox. That way when I want to read a book on my phone or on my tablet from my computer it updates to the last page that I read. Great.
reviews.author: Ronald Klug

reviews.title: Easy to Navigate
reviews.comment: Moon Reader is a great app. It would be good to be able to create your own libraries with personalised categories.
reviews.author: Mark Williams

reviews.title: Great ebook reader
reviews.comment: Does a great job as a reader for non-PDF format ebooks.
reviews.author: Michael Fry

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: I was never a fan of ebook readers but since I got this on my galaxy s4 I havent read a book outside of this format.
reviews.author: Matthew Ivey

reviews.title: Nexus 7 Pro version
reviews.comment: Nice to see developer actively forging the software to be best in class... well done.
reviews.author: John Fleet

reviews.title: Best e-reader in Android
reviews.comment: Been trying apps like mantano and others, but moon reader pro still rocks with their affordability and their features. Really value for money. :-)
reviews.author: Lemuel Lim

reviews.title: Best e-Reader
reviews.comment: Have tried quite a lot of the e-readers and this definitely comes out on top.
reviews.author: Steve Breakwell

reviews.title: Still the best ANYTHING reader!
reviews.comment: The text to speech function really made this app shine for me. The free Ivona Amy(UK) TTS app is IMHO the best voice to listen to books with; at least until they make a Morgan Freeman voice app. The PDF and CBR support let me delete two other apps from my device. Moon+ grows more spectacular with every update. I\'ve seen MMOs that updated with useful content less often than Moon+ Reader. Bonus: Dev(s) is/are very fast to address bugs. (Make sure you report any or they won\'t know!)
reviews.author: A Google User
